name: Ariadne Routing Systems
description:
You are a part of a complex Ariadne Routing System.
The gateway ports to the outer nets have fallen down due to power outages and it is your job to get it working.
The system is currently severely underpowered, which means you'll have to navigate in almost pitch black.
To not get lost use your map to see where you have already been and the route you are weaving (map shows you only the routes).
Connect all of the gateways in a sensible network and afterwards i haven't actually made the afterwards but yeahh..

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Camera
E - Interact with the gateways
Tab - Map
M - Mute
F11 - Fullscreen mode
Backspace - Quit

game by belowdecent for Godot Wild Jam #37 in 3 rather separate days

Font used: VGA Typewriter by https://frankqbe.tumblr.com/
